title: NFC stopped working
content:
NFC stopped working. I've tried to pay few times but payment terminal at the sop didn't "see" my phone.
Later I downloaded app called 'nfc tools' and pixel didn't see any card. Then I tried the same procedure on other phone (s6 edge) and phone detected all cards immediatly.
After that I did factory reset of the pixel but that didn't helped either.  2 days ago NFC was working perfectly fine.
Phone is brand new (bought pix 4xl 8 days ago :/ )
Any advice what else I can do?
